about_the_game:
Buy cautiously, the price is not worth it

This DLC has only one function: it is to replace the main character image of the character interface. There are 8 optional images of men and women. Core Function Select a local PNG file to customize your avatar. Sell skin? Yeah, he seems pretty cheap for his skin. But for a single game, he is not worth this price, and even some players will tease just rotten money. So to remind players, this DLC does not have any substantial gameplay, nor does it have any attribute improvements, it is just a custom skin feature. Please buy according to your own needs and preferences!

Disclaimer

This DLC essentially reads local graphics and copies them to the local installation file directory. It does not have functions such as uploading and spreading. Nevertheless, we also hope that members will not use incongruous images, take screenshots or even spread content that does not comply with local laws and infringes on the copyright of others. "Zhi Chuan" and I will not be responsible for the legal problems caused by the dissemination of illegal graphics
